item.title: Jae add a quote by Marcus Tullius Cicero
item.description: "A room without books is like a body without a soul." -- Marcus Tullius Cicero

item.title: Jae add a quote by William W. Purkey
item.description: "You've gotta dance like there's nobody watching, Love like you'll never be hurt, Sing like there's nobody listening, And live like it's heaven on earth." -- William W. Purkey

item.title: Jae add a quote by Mahatma Gandhi
item.description: "Live as if you were to die tomorrow. Learn as if you were to live forever." -- Mahatma Gandhi

item.title: Jae add a quote by Oscar Wilde
item.description: "We are all in the gutter, but some of us are looking at the stars." -- Oscar Wilde

item.title: Jae add a quote by Allen Saunders
item.description: "Life is what happens to you while you're busy making other plans." -- Allen Saunders

item.title: Jae add a quote by Robert A. Heinlein
item.description: "You have attributed conditions to villainy that simply result from stupidity." -- Robert A. Heinlein

item.title: Jae add a quote by Laurel Thatcher Ulrich
item.description: "Well-behaved women seldom make history." -- Laurel Thatcher Ulrich

item.title: Jae add a quote by Robert A. Heinlein
item.description: "A dying culture invariably exhibits personal rudeness. Bad manners. Lack of consideration for others in minor matters. A loss of politeness, of gentle manners, is more significant than is a riot." -- Robert A. Heinlein

item.title: Jae add a quote by Anton Chekhov
item.description: "Any idiot can face a crisis; it's this day-to-day living that wears you out." -- Anton Chekhov

item.title: Jae add a quote by Mark Twain
item.description: "Few things are harder to put up with than the annoyance of a good example." -- Mark Twain

item.title: Jae add a quote by Oscar Wilde
item.description: "The truth is rarely pure and never simple." -- Oscar Wilde

item.title: Jae add a quote by Lily Tomlin
item.description: "Man invented language to satisfy his deep need to complain." -- Lily Tomlin

item.title: Jae add a quote by Thomas Adcock
item.description: "There's no sense to being Irish unless you know the world's going to break your heart." -- Thomas Adcock

item.title: Jae add a quote by Johann Wolfgang von Goethe
item.description: "There is nothing more frightful than ignorance in action." -- Johann Wolfgang von Goethe

item.title: Jae add a quote by Isaac Asimov
item.description: "All evil is good become cancerous." -- Isaac Asimov

item.title: Jae add a quote by Woody Allen
item.description: "I don't want to achieve immortality through my work; I want to achieve immortality through not dying. I don't want to live on in the hearts of my countrymen; I want to live on in my apartment." -- Woody Allen

item.title: Jae add a quote by J.R.R. Tolkien
item.description: "It does not do to leave a live dragon out of your calculations, if you live near him." -- J.R.R. Tolkien

item.title: Jae add a quote by Philip K. Dick
item.description: "If I'd known it was harmless, I'd have killed it myself!" -- Philip K. Dick

item.title: Jae add a quote by Baltasar Gracian
item.description: "Never compete with someone who has nothing to lose." -- Baltasar Gracian

item.title: Jae add a quote by Samuel Johnson
item.description: "I would rather be attacked than unnoticed. For the worst thing you can do to an author is to be silent as to his works." -- Samuel Johnson

item.title: Jae add a quote by H. G. Wells
item.description: "No passion in the world is equal to the passion to alter someone else's draft." -- H. G. Wells

item.title: Jae add a quote by Virginia Woolf
item.description: "Writing is like sex. First you do it for love, then you do it for your friends, and then you do it for money." -- Virginia Woolf

item.title: Jae add a quote by Edmund Burke
item.description: "The only thing necessary for the triumph of evil is for good men to do nothing." -- Edmund Burke

item.title: Jae add a quote by Anaïs Nin
item.description: "We don't see things as they are, we see them as we are." -- Anaïs Nin

item.title: Jae add a quote by Andre Gide
item.description: "It is better to be hated for what you are than to be loved for what you are not." -- Andre Gide

item.title: Jae add a quote by Howard Phillips Lovecraft
item.description: "Almost nobody dances sober, unless they happen to be insane." -- Howard Phillips Lovecraft

item.title: Jae add a quote by John Dvorak
item.description: "In all large corporations, there is a pervasive fear that someone, somewhere is having fun with a computer on company time. Networks help alleviate that fear." -- John Dvorak

item.title: Jae add a quote by Thomas Jefferson
item.description: "The most valuable of all talents is that of never using two words when one will do." -- Thomas Jefferson

item.title: Jae add a quote by George Bernard Shaw
item.description: "Pasteboard pies and paper flowers are being banished from the stage by the growth of that power of accurate observation which is commonly called cynicism by those who have not got it...." -- George Bernard Shaw

item.title: Jae add a quote by Cheris Kramarae
item.description: "Feminism is the radical notion that women are human beings." -- Cheris Kramarae
